QuizOverviews.quizDescription: This is a description for sample quiz 1.

questions.questionText: What is the capital of France?
questions.reason: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

questions.questionText: Which element has the chemical symbol 'O'?
questions.reason: Oxygen is the chemical element with the symbol 'O' and atomic number 8.

QuizOverviews.quizDescription: This is a description for sample quiz 2.

questions.questionText: What is the boiling point of water?
questions.reason: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at standard atmospheric pressure.

questions.questionText: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
questions.reason: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
